file_content.text: I've sent a team out to gather the laser drills. The Republic will soon have a taste of its own medicine. If all goes well, I might even get a promotion.
The vibrations have stopped! You must have killed the sappers.
I admit I had some doubts, but the outpost is safe. Along with my job. Thank you.
Don't claim the credit.
Oh--really? I was hoping... no, I suppose you're right. You did the work so you get the credit.
I'm glad to help.
Your modesty is... alien to me. But you did the job, and that's all that matters.
I won't aid you again.
Respectfully, a good leader understands the importance of delegating tasks to others.
You know, my spies recently uncovered the location of a Republic base. I've a mind to gather up those laser drills and return the favor....
You must hurry! The sappers are getting closer. I can feel the vibrations.
...then maybe the search team should have avoided the wampa cave instead of going inside! Crazy to think there'd be wampas in a wampa cave.
I don't care what they thought--
We're too late. They're going to kill us all.
If the enemy is nearby, point me in the right direction and let me do what I do best.
Not if I can help it.
We don't even know where they are!
Are you saying the Republic has launched an attack?
Are we under assault?
Not in the conventional sense, no. That's what makes it so difficult.
What are you talking about? I haven't seen any fighting.
No one's going to kill us.
That's because there isn't any! That's why we can't win!
Identify yourself.
I'm Captain Viatar. I'm... in charge around here. At least, for the time being.
Control your emotions, Captain. You're an embarrassment to your rank.
Panic is unseemly.
This is not how a high ranking officer should behave.
Calm down.
Calm down. You're embarrassing me.
Get a grip.
I'm sorry. It's just... Command will blame me for this, I just know it!
Republic sappers are tunneling under the base, melting the ice with laser drills. They're trying to bring the outpost down on top of us.
I've heard of the great work you're doing for the Empire. You're a hero to us all. Can't... can't you go out and find them? Stop them?
False flattery will avail you of nothing.
I detest suck-ups.
Do you honestly expect me to fall for such blatant flattery?
Save your sucking up.
If you say no, who can I send? My search squads keep getting slaughtered by wampas.
Enough with the false flattery. Do you think I'm stupid?
Stop sucking up.
It's not false! You're my last hope. My search squads keep getting slaughtered by wampas.
Very well.
Isn't that your job?
Me? Are you mad? Every squad I've sent out gets slaughtered by wampas.
At least, I think they're wampas. No one really knows. The attacks just... come out of nowhere.
The best thing to do is send someone with a proven track record to search for the sappers. Please--I have no one left to ask.
I'll use their own cutting lasers on them. They'll regret taking on the Empire.
I'll make them suffer.
Keep the fires warm. I'll be back in no time.
Then let me get started.
Fine. I'll do it.
Thank you! Please--hurry. I don't think we have much time before the outpost collapses.
Take responsibility for your outpost, Captain.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
You really want me--me!--to go out there? But... I... well, I suppose I don't have a choice.
I can't talk right now. I'm trying to save my job.
